title: Starstruck
description: What will you do if a celebrity drops everything after meeting you, enrolls in your school, and become your seatmate? That's what happened with Dulce Gavin, and she definitely wasn't prepared for this roller coaster ride. Follow her and the celebrity Glace McKenzie as they discover love, the true meaning of friendship, and sticking with family in this cute but quirky lesbian novel.
author: Yuriko Hime
